comments:
Description:
The method getInstance(element) in class ScriptExecutor doesn't process null 
parameter input.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run attached file Case134314_Accepted_Transactions_Merchant_Detai(modified)-
de.xml

Expected result:
No Exception

Actual result:
